text: Choo Kyung-ho (Korean: 추경호, born 29 July 1960) is a South Korean economist and politician. He is the Deputy Prime Minister of Economy, the Minister of Economy and Finance, Acting Prime Minister, and the Acting President since the 27th of December, 2024.. He has been the Member of the National Assembly for Dalseong since 2016. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Choo Kyung-ho
